articles.title: Microsoft Flight Sim 2024 now has a Stranger Things expansion
articles.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 just introduced an expansion inspired by the Netflix show Stranger Things. It lets people fly over Hawkins and complete missions.
articles.content:
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 just got a fairly bizarre expansion inspired by the Netflix show Stranger Things. If you've ever wanted to fly over a fictional Indiana town in the 1980s, this is the update for you.
That's right. The game now lets fol... [465 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things fans concerned for favourite star after Netflix post
articles.description: Stranger Things fans are convinced they know who will be killed in the next instalment of Season 5, thanks to a major clue released by Netflix
articles.content:
Stranger Things season 5 official Netflix trailer
Stranger Things enthusiasts are certain they've identified the next victim in season 5 following a significant "hint" dropped by Netflix.
Devotees of the beloved series have grown accustomed to extend... [3368 chars]

articles.title: Explore Iconic Stranger Things Locations Thanks To New MFS Update
articles.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator has shown off some of the Stranger Things locations coming to the game, and they're all looking pretty fantastic.
articles.content: The surprising crossover betweenStranger Things and Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is now available, and a series of new images reveal major locations from the show that make it into the game. While Microsoft Flight Simulator represents the gold sta... [1950 chars]

articles.title: When the Phone Number in That TV Show Actually Connects Somewhere
articles.description: Passing on the classic 555 number, “Stranger Things” is the latest show to offer Easter eggs for viewers who try to call a fictional character.
articles.content: In the final season of the Netflix hit “Stranger Things,” which dropped last month, posters are put up around the fictional town of Hawkins, Ind., seeking the character Eleven (a.k.a. Jane Hopper, played by Millie Bobby Brown), along with a phone num... [1979 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things fans spot huge clue major character will die and it’s not who you think
articles.description: One Netflix post has left Stranger Things fans concerned
articles.content:
One Netflix post has left Stranger Things fans concerned
Stranger Things fans are convinced they know who will be killed in the next instalment of season 5 thanks to a major "clue" released by Netflix.

articles.title: 'Stranger Things' Star Sadie Sink Stuns Fans in Luxury Brand Campaign: 'She Looks Divine'
articles.description: From Hawkins to high fashion, the 'Stranger Things' star is the latest spokesperson for BLVGARI and has fans dazzled by her looks.
articles.content: The Netflix series Stranger Things has put the main cast on the Hollywood map, with Sadie Sink being a new spokesperson for BVLGARI. Sink dazzled fans with her new campaign for the luxury brand, covered in diamonds and accentuating her fiery red hair... [1464 chars]

articles.title: Gen X Woman Spots One Thing ‘Stranger Things’ Gets Wrong About 1980s
articles.description: "I’m just going to believe that was the name of half the girls in the background in every season,” the poster told Newsweek.
articles.content:
A Generation X woman and avid fan of Stranger Things has pointed out the one thing the hit Netflix series gets wrong about growing up in 1980s America.
The fifth and final season of Stranger Things is upon us, with the first batch of four episodes ar... [5306 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things fans fume Winona Ryder gets snubbed from show
articles.description: Stranger Things fans are livid Winona Ryder has been forgotten about and snubbed from show when she used to be the drawing appeal main lead.
articles.content: Do you remember what life was like when Stranger Things debuted? I fear some of you were still in school. Dear reader, I had almost graduated university. Netflix was newish to the point where I used to look at WIKIPEDIA to see what shows were coming ... [1709 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things Season 5 Officially Ends The Netflix Show’s Worst Trend
articles.description: In Stranger Things season 5, one twist sees the Netflix series breaks free from a tired trope and proves the show has evolved, much to fans' relief.
articles.content: Although Stranger Things repeatedly indulged in one tired trope throughout the show’s first four seasons, the ending of season 5, volume 1, proves that the show has solved this particular problem. Stranger Things season 5, volume 1 has arrived, and t... [4338 chars]
